00036 void 
00037 do_tfgc(const char *config, bool debug, bool dryrun) {
00038   if (debug)
00039     Logger::set_level(log4cpp::Priority::DEBUG);
00040 
00041   try {
00042     PropertiesPtr props = new Properties(config);
00043     Comm *comm = new Comm();
00044     ConnectionManagerPtr conn_mgr = new ConnectionManager(comm);
00045     DfsBroker::Client *fs = new DfsBroker::Client(conn_mgr, props);
00046     ClientPtr ht_ptr = new Hypertable::Client("testgc", config);
00047     TablePtr table_ptr;
00048 
00049     table_ptr = ht_ptr->open_table("METADATA");
00050 
00051     master_gc_once(table_ptr, fs, dryrun);
00052   }
00053   catch (exception &e) {
00054     cerr << "Error: "<< e.what() << endl;
00055     exit(1);
00056   }
00057 }
00058 
00059 } // local namespace

00061 int 
00062 main(int ac, char *av[]) {
00063   char **it = av + 1, **arg_end = av + ac;
00064   bool debug = false, dryrun = false;
00065   char *config = "conf/hypertable.cfg";
00066   System::initialize(av[0]);
00067 
00068   for (; it < arg_end; ++it) {
00069     if (!strcmp("-d", *it))
00070       debug = true;
00071     else if (!strcmp("-n", *it))
00072       dryrun = true;
00073     else if (!strcmp("-f", *it))
00074       config = *++it;
00075   }
00076   ReactorFactory::initialize(4);
00077   do_tfgc(config, debug, dryrun);
00078 
00079   return 0;
00080 }
